welcome_description:
Welcome to the Bluecherry Surveillance DVR!
This wizard will help you connect to your DVR server.
configure_description: Setup a connection to your remote DVR server. You can connect to any number of servers, from anywhere in the world.
name: Name
lets_go_description: Here's some tips on how to get started.
tip_0: Cameras are shown on left. You can double-click or drag the camera into the live area to view it.
tip_1: Use the buttons above the live view to create, save and switch layouts - even with cameras from multiple servers.
tip_2: Double-click on a server to open its configuration page in a new window, where you can configure cameras and recordings.
tip_3: Click the events icon to open the event browser and watch or save recordings.
server_not_added_error: {} could not be added. Please check the entered details.
press_back_again_to_exit: Press back button again to exit
remove_server_description: {} will be removed from the application. You'll not be able to view cameras from this server & will no longer receive notifications.
